tool_description: Provide any text and receive it in mp3 format. You can select from a range of different voices.
name: Realistic Text to Speech
title: Realistic Text to Speech

api_list.name: Generate Realistic Text to Voice
api_list.description: Generate realistic text to voice using our easy to use endpoint. You can select from 100s of voices which are ready to use. Allow up to 60 seconds for the voice to return.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Welcome to the realistic text to voice API on Rapid API, where you can customize all your text into realistic sounding speech.

api_list.name: List of Voices
api_list.description: View all available voices. Each voice has an ID, the ID is then used to select your voice you wish to use when running the `generate` command.
